'''Otogi "Rakushi" Square Table''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Otogi "Rakushi" Square Table is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]] on [[Tsurumi Island]]. The Remarkable Chest is available after unlocking [[The Sea of Fog and the Rite of the Trees]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a Remarkable Chest on a beach directly south from the [[Teleport Waypoint]] in [[Moshiri Ceremonial Site]] on Tsurumi Island. It is normally available on the third day of Tsurumi Island's [[Tsurumi Island#Three-Day Cycle|Three-Day Cycle]]; however, it is possible for Remarkable Chests to appear on different days if the cycle becomes desynced.
